Original:

身處其中，會很放鬆舒緩，卻也會不知不覺地不省人事⋯⋯

Original:
今天來時恰好客人甚多，不過服務依然可稱週到，以不收服務費的前提下以是盡善盡美

調酒部分，第一杯是馬丁尼，偏Dry作法，口感上佳，不過於個人而言略顯不夠Dry

第二杯是酒吧特調莓遇過壞人，基酒是白蘭地，明明是黃色調卻做出了覆盆莓風味，初聞確實青檸味，入口才是覆盆莓與白蘭地的香氣混合，最後回口則是香橙味，酒感略重，喜歡重酒感又希望有足夠變化的朋友可以嘗試

第三杯則是白色俄羅斯，以牛奶奶泡取代鮮奶油，口感上佳，酒感輕，十分適合作為開頭或收尾酒

總體而言，是一件適合三五好友一起喝酒的好店
EN:
There are a lot of guests when I come today, but the service can still be called thoughtful.

The section of the bartender, the first cup is Martini, is partially DRY, and has a good taste, but it is not enough to be DRY.

The second cup is a bad guy that has been adjusted by the bar. The base wine is Bailan. Obviously it is a yellow tone but made the flavor of raspberry. The first smell is really lime flavor. The exit is orange flavor. The wine feels slightly heavy. Friends who like heavy wine and hope that there is enough change can try

The third cup is White Russia, which replaces fresh cream with grandma. It has a good taste and light wine.

Overall, it is a good shop suitable for three or five friends to drink together

Original:
可麗露很好吃，菜單很有創意，酒還好，偏貴。

bartender的技術不到，而且態度很差，點餐時問他可否直接點請他特調，他說是隨便(菜單上的品項)嗎？ 我說不是，是特調，我想要芭樂為基底，酒感重一點的，他說所以是隨便嗎？又要重複一次，然後接著又說你點菜單上也有一個是芭樂基底的，我決定放棄，直接說好。

不跟我解釋原因，也不說為何不能調，強制性話術一直要我點菜單上的，說真的非常不合理，很明顯的就是不想做，不然就是不會！當下若直接說明及解釋，我都可以接受跟點菜單，明明也事前問過，但就是不願意做，說真的，這觀感很不舒服！🙄

若想要喝厲害的調酒跟特調的話請別來這間。
EN:
Ke Lilu is delicious, the menu is very creative, the wine is okay, it is expensive.

Bartender's technology is not available, and his attitude is very poor. When you order, ask him if he can order him directly. He said it was casual (the item on the menu)?I said no, it is special, I want guava as a base, and the wine feels more heavy. Is he said so casually?Repeat it again, and then say that there is one on the menu on the menu. I decided to give up and say hello.

Don't explain the reason to me, and don't say why you can't adjust it. The mandatory talk has always asked me to order the menu. It is really unreasonable, it is obvious that you don't want to do it, otherwise it will not!If you directly explain and explain at the moment, I can accept the ordering menu, and I have asked it beforehand, but I just do n’t want to do it. Seriously, this view is very uncomfortable!Bleak

If you want to drink a powerful bartending and special adjustment, please don't come here.
